title: Q1 - Which LAVA logo do you prefer?
body:
As you know, we originally had our Lavaboy logo to start, and later, we changed the logo to a dark blue version. However, we have recently heard that our community wants the fiery guy back.
Today, our iLAVA holders will vote whether you like the original logo (LAVAboy) or our current LOGO (dark blue, letter L)？

如你所知，我们最初是用LAVAboy的LOGO，后来我们把LOGO改成了深蓝色的版本。但是我们最近听说，我们的社区希望用回LAVAboy的LOGO。今天，我们的iLAVA持有者将投票决定你是喜欢原来的LOGO（LAVAboy）还是我们现在的LOGO（深蓝色，字母L）？
author: 0x6227dA29eb9dDD4F1aa004689B4120118Ec0D9b6
